 1200 :

 1220 printchr$(147)
 1230 su=0
 1240 fori=1to170
 1250 reada
 1260 su=su+a
 1270 poke49151+i,a
 1280 next
 1290 ifsu<>17417 then print "fehler in den datazeilen":end
 1300 print"ok":end
